text: In Documenter `@index` blocks, is there anyway to have names shown as just `my_function` rather than as the fully qualified name `MyModule.my_function`

elements.text: blocks, is there anyway to have names shown as just
rather than as the fully qualified name

text: Are they fully qualified on the at-docs blocks? Setting `CurrentModule` in an at-meta block could be a way around this (<https://juliadocs.github.io/Documenter.jl/stable/man/syntax/#@meta-block>).

elements.text: Are they fully qualified on the at-docs blocks? Setting
in an at-meta block could be a way around this (

text:
Yeah they appear fully qualified in the at-autodoc block too. There's an at-meta block CurrentModule set as you suggest.
 TBF they're unexported names, so I'm not too surprised if this isn't possible. 
Thanks anyway
